====================================
Tender Information
-----------------

### Title

EF937-230999 - 2 - Mechanical and Electrical Retrofit of the Canadian Meteorological Centre

### Solicitation Number

WS3841411278

### Publication Date

July 5, 2023

### Tender Closing Date

Monday, August 21, 2023, at 14:00:00 (local time)

### Amendment Date

August 15, 2023

### Expected Contract Duration

The contract is expected to run from the contract start date to March 31, 2025.

### Tender Status

Expired

### Tender Type

Open Competition

### Contracting Entity

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

### End-User Entity

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting proposals from multi-disciplinary engineering consultants to provide mechanical and electrical retrofit services for the Canadian Meteorological Centre (CMC) in Dorval. The objectives of this project are to:

* Conduct a thorough assessment of the existing mechanical and electrical systems
* Develop and implement a comprehensive retrofit plan
* Perform the necessary installation, testing, and commissioning works

The details of this request can be found in the solicitation documents.

### Proponents Requirements

To be considered for this project, proponents must:

* Have a valid CAE (Certified Administrative Expeditor) certification
* Possess a valid WSIB (Workplace Safety and Insurance Board) certification
* Ensure a minimum of 75% of the project work force are certified Apprentices
* Provide proof of OSHA (Occupational Safety and Health Administration) training
* Provide proof of Worksafe BC training and certification

### Investigation of Trade Agreements

This procurement will be conducted in compliance with trade agreements concluded between Canada and other countries. Proponents are required to ensure that their proposal complies with these agreements.

### No Site Visit Required

No site visit will be required as a condition of the proposal submission.

### Information Contact

For further information regarding this RFP, please contact:

Fahad Zanoun
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note:
* All communication will be in English.
* The PWGSC (Ariba Discovery) system will be used to distribute and receive the RFP documents.
